name: Hyperbolic Chern-Simons k-Function
description: Refining the mapping from Chern-Simons level k to Hyperbolic Volume V to satisfy Witten consistency.

hypothesis.H0: Chern-Simons level k is independent of Hyperbolic Volume V, or no integer-valued k(V) achieves > 95% consistency rate.
hypothesis.H1: k(V) is a predictable integer function of V (e.g., k = floor(alpha * V + beta)) that achieves > 95% consistency with Witten invariants.

data_requirements.description: Chern-Simons level k and Volume V across KnotInfo/LinkInfo dataset.

test_method: Exhaustive search and optimization of integer-valued function k(V) across different crossing number slices (3-12).
